Class RemoteController

  • java.lang.Object
    • RemoteController

  • public class RemoteController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the remote-side application including its network connectivity.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private java.lang.Thread screenCaptureThread

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteController

        public RemoteController(NetworkModel networkModel)

    • Method Detail

      • startReceiving

        private void startReceiving()
        Starts a loop that continuously receives incoming Parcels from the viewer. Parcels are passed on to the relevant handler based on feature name.

      • handlePopupParcel

        private void handlePopupParcel(java.lang.Object payload)
        Handler for Parcels of the popup feature. Displays a dialog box and responds to the viewer when the dialog box is closed by the user.
        Parameters:
        payload - string array with the popup's title and body

      • handleTerminalParcel

        private void handleTerminalParcel(java.lang.Object payload)
        Handler for Parcels of the terminal feature. Launches a cmd process, executes the specified command and sends the output back to the viewer.
        Parameters:
        payload - command to execute

      • handleScreenParcel

        private void handleScreenParcel(java.lang.Object payload)
        Handler for Parcels of the screen feature. Starts (or stops) a screen capture thread that continuously sends screenshots to the viewer.
        Parameters:
        payload - "start" or "stop"
